content:
Arrest after 45 months of opportunity to destroy/fixing the evidences, can not be political-vendetta. 

PC/BC ,@,INCIndia, ,@,NCPspeaks, and other crooks should instead be thankful to ,@,narendramodi, ,@,arunjaitley, govt for a very long rope given to them thus far,

,#,KartiPCarrested

And let’s be CLEAR, king-pin in all these FERA/FIPB/ML/IT violation-cases is daddy & Ex-FM ,@,PChidambaram_IN,. Without his fixing of Govt rules/procedures, BC ,@,KartiPC, couldn’t have extort the money from crooked companies/businessmen,

When will PC be arrested?

,#,KartiPCarrested

Too early to get into credit-showering ... BC was just the collection-agent. PC was/is the head of the Mafia.

Let's wait till PC (then Vadra, TDK, Buddhu etc.) arrested ..

,#,KartiPCarrested,https://,twitter.com/Swamy39/status,/968694867118444544, ,…

LOL ..  Now daddy ,@,PChidambaram_IN, has left the building (oops, sorry country) ,

What was the rush Mr PC? Why left the poor kid ,@,KartiPC, in hands of Fascist Modi's CBI/ED?

Did @OfficeOfRG sent him to fix his a/cs in London?,

,#,KartiPCarrested,https://,twitter.com/AnchorAnandN/s,tatus/968700448025841664, ,…

Its HIGHLY SUSPICIOUS that ,@,PChidambaram_IN, left the country, just before ,@,KartiPC, landed (and arrested).

Did someone in CBI/ED/FM ALERTED PC (and Congress folks)?,

,@,narendramodi, ,@,arunjaitley, what's gong on? Is this a joke?

,#,BC_In_PC_Out
What about Jay Shah s/o Amit Shah whose cases have been withdrawn .

No wonder ,@,Dev_Fadnavis, & ,@,bjpmaha, also seems to have totally forgotten all the election speech & gimmicks about what & all was said abt NCP Corruption, Sharad Pawar, Ajit Pawar etc.... Will they ever be jailed?
KUCH NAHI HONE WALA !!!! SAB KE SAB EK HI THALI KE CHTTE BATTE HAI.
